title.title: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND SWING TOUR
title.text: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND SWING TOUR
title.html: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND SWING TOUR

tagline.title: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND SWING TOUR IS DOUBLE EXPERIENCE FOR ENJOY RIDING AND ELEPHANT AND THEN DO JUNGLE SWING AT BALI SWING
tagline.text: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND SWING TOUR IS DOUBLE EXPERIENCE FOR ENJOY RIDING AND ELEPHANT AND THEN DO JUNGLE SWING AT BALI SWING
tagline.html: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND SWING TOUR IS DOUBLE EXPERIENCE FOR ENJOY RIDING AND ELEPHANT AND THEN DO JUNGLE SWING AT BALI SWING

description.text: Bali Elephant Ride and Swing Tour is Bali Double Activities Tour packages for enjoy the amazing riding an elephant for 30 minutes through jungle and see local village, then continue for visit Bali Swing for enjoy the jungle swing and take picture at many spot such as bird nest and etc at Bali Swing. Is popular activity for riding the biggest animal elephant and then do swing in the jungle with amazing panorama view. Our first adventure will be to elephant park to enjoy the adventure of riding an elephant for 30 minutes along the tracks that have been provided, where you will explore the forest with such beautiful scenery and passing local villages with various activities of local residents in this village, the elephant guide will always provide the best services to provide satisfaction for you during the elephant adventure ride, after that we will enjoy a buffet lunch in elephant park, after lunch we will head to the Bali swing to enjoy the swing rides available in this place, where you will swing in By seeing the beautiful natural scenery of the forest, besides swinging, you can also take photos in some spots in this place with such a beautiful background, this place is perfect for those of you who like to take pictures. Finished on Bali Swing we will head back to the hotel by bringing a very impressive experience in the Bali Elephant Ride and Swing Tour package.

title.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Elephant Ride and Spa Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Elephant Ride and Swing Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Elephant Ride Tour is some great adventure to riding an Elephant in Bali islands, This journey will give amazing experience to sit on teak chair on the top of the elphant and see the beautiful panoraman view surrounds the parks. The elphant parks we will visit is the Bakas Elephant Park in Klungkung regency, in here you will riding an elephant or 30 minutes ride and will assist by professional Elephant Tour Guide. You will go along green bushes and side of river. During the Elephant Trip you will also see beautiful green hill and sometimes appearance of monkey's.

You will go along green bushes and side of river. During the Elephant Trip you will also see beautiful green hill and sometimes appearance of monkey's.

title.title: Bali Swing Tour | Bali Elephant Ride and Swing Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Swing Tour | Bali Elephant Ride and Swing Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Swing Tour is an adventure activity that we created for those of you who want to enjoy swings on the island of Bali with very beautiful scenery in the forest, really the sensation of a tour that is different from the others. Swing in Bali is an activity that has just been introduced, but because of the enthusiasm of the tourists who want to try this activity making swing activities famous among domestic and foreign tourists. The activity is located in the village of Bongkasa, close to Ubud. And this swing attraction can be combined with several tours to visit tourism objects in Bali.
description.html: Bali Swing Tour is an adventure activity that we created for those of you who want to enjoy swings on the island of Bali with very beautiful scenery in the forest, really the sensation of a tour that is different from the others. price.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Swing Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Elephant Ride and Swing Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,550,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,250,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 1,150,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 1,100,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 1,050,000/person

Note :

  • Get special price for group booking

Bali Elephant Ride and Swing Tour Price Included :

  • Private Car with Clean, Comfortable and Good A/C condition
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • 30 Minutes Elephant Ride Adventure
  • Jungle Swing at Bali Swing
  • Professional Elephant Guide
  • Lunch buffet Indonesian Food
  • Mineral Water
  • Insurance Coverage

itinerary.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Swing Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Lunch finish and continue the tour
Enjoy Jungle Swing at Bali Swing

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
